sbmR 0.0.0.9000

    • Sampling From Posterior

Reference

Model Setup

create_sbm()

Create a new instance of an SBM model

copy_sbm()

Copy existing SBM object

Network

Functions for manipulating underlying network structure of SBM model

add_node()

Add a new node to network

add_connection()

Add connection/edge between two nodes in network

set_node_parent()

Set the parent of a node

initialize_groups()

Assign groups for all nodes

get_state()

Dump state of model to dataframe

load_from_state()

Load model state from state dump

Modeling

Function to fit or investigate fit of SBM model

mcmc_sweep()

Run a single MCMC sweep over nodes

collapse_groups()

Agglomeratively merge groups

collapse_run()

Run Agglomerative Merging to target a range of group numbers

choose_best_collapse_state()

Choose and load best model state from agglomerative collapsing algorithm

compute_entropy()

Compute entropy for current model state

sample_posterior()

Sample from model posterior

Visualization

Functions to visualize the structure of network and/or results of modeling

visualize_collapse_results()

Visualize agglomerative collapse results

visualize_network()

Visualize network stucture

Network Simulation

Functions to generate networks using the stochastic block model. Usefull for testing etc..

sim_basic_block_network()

Simulate stochastic block model of given number of groups

sim_random_network()

Simulate completely random network

sim_sbm_network()

Simulate network using stochastic block model

Contents

  • Model Setup
  • Network
  • Modeling
  • Visualization
  • Network Simulation
